request.description:
Logs a user in, gets a jwt token.

## Body Params
* email
* password

Adds a grade to an assignment

## Path Params
* student assignment id

## Body Params
* grade (decimal)

Adds a grade to an assignment

## Path Params
* student assignment id

## Body Params
* grade (decimal)

Deletes a student assignment.

## Path Params
* Student Assignment id

## Body Params
* is_private (boolean)

## Behavior
This action will create a mod.

Updates a student assignment.

## Path Params
* Student Assignment id

## Body Params
* is_private (boolean)
* weight_id
* name
* due (date)

## Behavior
This action will create a mod.

Gets a student assignment by id.

## Path Params
* student assignment id

Add an assignment to a class.

## Path Params
* class id

## Body Params
* name
* due (date)
* weight_id

## Behavior

This will not create a mod.

This will add the assignment to all enrolled students, as well as students enroll after this is added.

Lists assignments for a class.

## Path Params
* class id

Uploads a file for a class to AWS.

## Path Params
* class id

## Body Params
* file
* is_syllabus (boolean)

## Behavior
Uploading a syllabus will cause class status to progress.

Gets list of all uploaded files for a class.

## Path Params
* class id

Lists the possible class statuses.

Note: Ghost is also a class status, but is determined by enrollment.

Lists the count of classes in each status.

## Behavior
Ghost classes also have a status, and will be listed with the status as opposed to ghost.
The help types that a class can have.
The change types that a class can have.

Admin functionality to select a status for a class.

## Path Params
* class id

## Body Params
* class_status_id

Lists weights for a class.

## Path Params
* class id

Updates a class weight

## Path Params
* id

## Body Params
* name
* weight (decimal)

Adds a help request to a class. ## Path Params * class id * help type id ## Body Params * note ## Behavior This will change class status. ## Note This is meant to be used when a class is not complete. If a class is complete, use a change request.

Marks a help request as complete.

## Path Params
* help request id

## Behavior
This will not change class statuses. The class status needs to be set once all help requests are complete, or once an appropriate status is determined.

Adds a change request to a class.

## Path Params
* class id
* help type id

## Body Params
* note

## Behavior
This will change class status.

## Note
This is meant to be used when a class is complete. If a class is incomplete, use a help request.

Marks a change request as complete.

## Path Params
* change request id

## Behavior
This will not change class statuses. The class status needs to be set once all change requests are complete, or once an appropriate status is determined.

Shows all classes. Can be used as a search with multiple filters.

## Behavior:
   Only searches the current period

## Filters:
  * school
    * school id
  * professor.name
    * professor name
  * class.status
    * status id
    * For ghost classes, use 0.
  * class.name
    * class name
  * class.number
    * class number
  * class.meet_days
    * class meet_days
  * class.length
    * 1st Half
    * 2nd Half
    * Full Term
    * Custom

## Weights

  Weights are added as an array of weights one time through this route. They require name and weight. If is_points is false, they need to sum to 100. After a class has weights, the appropriate edit route needs to be used.
  
  This should only be used if the class is in the Weights status, and it will progress the class to the Assignments status.

## Required fields

name, 
number, 
meet_days, 
meet_start_time, 
meet_end_time,
seat_count, 
class_start, 
class_end, 
is_enrollable, 
grade_scale,
is_editable, 
class_period_id, 
is_syllabus, 
is_points

## Optional fields

crn, 
credits, 
location, 
professor_id, 
class_type

Gets a class.

## Path Params
* class id

Confirms that a class is ready to change stages from a stage that will not auto stage to the next step.

### Stages:
 * New Class -> [Syllabus, Weights]
 * Assignments -> Complete

Creates a class in the given class period.

## Defaults

grade_scale: A,90|B,80|C,70|D,60

## Required fields

name, 
number, 
meet_days, 
meet_start_time, 
meet_end_time,
seat_count, 
class_start, 
class_end, 
is_enrollable, 
is_editable, 
class_period_id, 
is_syllabus

## Optional fields

crn, 
credits, 
location, 
professor_id, 
class_type,
grade_scale, 
is_points
